summary: Add vampire NightVision part of LifeDetected and small change vampire cast and weakness.
descriptionHtml:
[list][*]When vampire use a vision, the desire of blood allows him to see aura creatures for a short time (3s). 
[*]Vampire NightVision now realy NIGHT - in the morning, he loses this ability (but not in interion).
[*]VampireDrain increase to twice for each stage.
[*][color=red]upd:[/color] VampireSunDamage in stage 4 now is real-time damage health (5dps). No wait, no fast-travel - only safe in near interion.
[*][color=red]upd:[/color] Because vampire not have other spell than Drain, this spell added to Destruction scools Frost and Shock. With a perk of both scool VampireDrain will be more powerfull spell (+100% Damage).[/list]
[size=1]Note: because vampire have \"BLOOD\" vision, creatures aura is \"RED\" for all, friend or hostile target.[/size]

For install just include .esp file in \\Data folder.

[size=1][color=red]Attention![/color] My version of master-file is russian. But i not change description and name - only data and execution sequence of script. If english version not be stable, i will rebuild it with english master-file.[/size]

P.S. I plan to add script of joining to VampireFaction in stage 4 to the vampire are not to be hostile to PC.
author: Whols aka Northwood

files.name: ReaLVamp
files.changelogHtml: Fix bag when NightVision spell was impossible to choose after the change of LessePower
